text:
@RandPaul Hey why don't you hold hearings on the lack of federal response to the Covid-19?  

If we had the same per-capita death rate from Covid-19 as S. Korea, only 1,683 Americans would be dead now.  Instead we have over 85,000 dead.  At least 83,000 deaths could have been prevented.
